item.title: Github - Command Line Interface Procedures
item.description: Summary Documenting the most common ways I interact with git and in maintaining my programs. For reference these actions are performed via the command line. In my opinion the main benefit of using a CLI is the added efficiency of the scripting out the majority of the process via usage of shell scripts. This allows you to direct all of your attention on effortless creating work without getting lost in a GUI just to push a new commit.
